name: SAILDRONE
description: Provides autonomous, wind- and solar-powered vehicles that collect maritime data
sampleDescriptions: Educate Members of Congress on autonomous marine vehicles
Educate Members of Congress on autonomous marine vehicles
Educate Members of Congress on autonomous marine vehicles
Educate Members of Congress on autonomous marine vehicles and advocate for the use of innovative technology for ocean data collection, bathymetry, and maritime domain awareness.
Advocate for funding to support ocean mapping and data collection.
